website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a large bottle, affordable price, and effective moisturizing properties in an after-sun formula, this is the best choice available.
pros: Ample 16-ounce portion that moisturizes and helps protect tanned skin, thanks to the nourishing formula that includes vitamin E, aloe vera, and panthenol
Has a pleasant "summery" scent and comes in a convenient pump bottle
cons: Though it contains natural oils, it also contains parabens and alcohol
Feels a bit sticky or tacky until it totally absorbs into the skin

customer_reviews.title: It smells exactly like the Australian Gold Dark Tanning Accelerator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use after tanning to moisturize. It smells exactly like the Australian Gold Dark Tanning Accelerator. The lotion is white. It does not leave you sticky after.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved almost everything about this lotion: good consistency, absorbed quickly, made my skin very soft. Here's the only con...it has a very strong tropical, coconut lime kind of smell to it. It was overwhelming for me. If you don't mind that, it's the lotion for you.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not oily, smells great, very soft
customer_reviews.text: First time tanning and I heard I needed to stay moisturized in between tanning sessions. I got this item due to great reviews and great pricing. I'm happy with it, smells very pretty, it is not too thick nor too thin, runs on great and a little goes along way, dries smooth and soft, NOT oily!!! This stuff is fabulous! I've been red and used this stuff and the next day I'll be all healed up and ready to do another session. It's amazing stuff! Definitely buying this stuff again!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sines

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really saves your tan!! However, it you are using it and go out in the sun, water blisters appeared all over me. Which never happens with other products I’ve used. But I didn’t mind them, you may not like them?? Kept my tan through July, aug and sept.. actually its December and my leg still have tan lines. I have NOT been tanning at all!! I will be using this product from now on! Smell good, isn’t greasy, soaks in with alittle sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Robina

customer_reviews.author: Nikki Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee ittttt

Lol I don’t want any other lotion now. Nothing has made my skin this soft! Definitely buying more and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Best Tan Extender and Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend Australian Gold Moisture Lock Tan Extender. Avid tanner. At beach in summer, tanning beds when not at the beach and have used several/many different brands of tan extending lotions and this is by far the best. Contains Aloe and Vitamin E which is essential to beautiful moisturized skin. Your skin will look and feel refreshed, moisturized, supple and youthful. Maintains that healthy looking tan. Definitely will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Light, quickly absorbed and provides all day moisture

The scent is amazing, as it is a bit beachy and outdoorsy, but not perfume laden. Appropriate scent for both male and female Fantastic product. I would recommend this wholeheartedly for anyone searching for a good non-greasy moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you do not like the smell of bubble gum!

It rubs in nicely and keeps my skin moisturized and soft.
customer_reviews.author: kroeneri

customer_reviews.title: Hate the scent

I am still actively tanning so I don’t necessarily know about the tan extending power, I guess time will have to tell on that one. The one thing I cannot get over is the smell. Something about it is so off/sour and really bothers me. I love the Australian gold dry tanning oil which has a similar scent but this lotion is just way too much for me to enjoy.

My arms were just ok with it, but my legs needed more lotion. After shaving I applied and went to bed. Woke up, scratched an itch and they were ashy as if I forgot to put on lotion. I don't have that issue with Banana Boat After Sun Lotion. So while this smells great, it's def a light duty lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken pump

customer_reviews.author: Adam Kocian

customer_reviews.title: Best After Sun Moisturizer out there

customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell. Not greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed that I could not find this at the stores anymore, so when I saw Amazon carried it, I had to purchase it. It has a nice smell and I find it does extend your tan. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NMR

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite lotion
customer_reviews.text: I found this lotion in Walgreens in Florida a few years ago and it has been my go to favorite ever since. It smells just like the beach but is not overwhelming and moisturizes my skin all day long without leaving it feeling oily or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Got super burnt and applied it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got super burnt and applied it for the rest of the week and didn’t peel at all! Only thing I have to say is that if you put it on your face it will make you break out. So either choose acne or peeling. Other than that I love it. Great scent and does what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this after sun moisturizer for many years now!Love how fast it dries in my skin &how soft it leaves my skin! The smell is nice &can be worn with regular Perfume! I also like the smell is not overpowering sunscreen smell!!! The Packaging was nicely done with Bubble wrap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought to of course use after indoor and outdoor tanning. Plenty of mosturizing qualities! Smells amazing! Unlike others, my bottle came in perfect condition. You can absolutly feel it mosturizing your skin when you apply. I will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for tanning!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is SO GOOD! I have probably bought 4 bottles by now. I used this every day when I was tanning in Arizona, and I never peeled once. I have very fair skin so I burn and peel easily, but this was a lifesaver I’m still tan 2 months later, and the consistency and smell of this lotion always feels nice after showering or before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on calming my sunburned skin and moisturize without feeling heavy or greasy. The smell is strong when you pump it out of the bottle, but dissipates some after it absorbs into the skin. Smells like coconut lime.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST ever! And so hard to find! I had no peeling and no discoloration from my cruise ran! And we are taking south Caribbean sun! This was a great addiction to my post sunscreen application after tanning all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. It does what It is supposed to do. The scent is quite potent, but dulls down once you put It on and It settles. Was very upset the pump was broken. I have to open It up and squeeze It to get out the lotion 🙄.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it, but did not
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great. Absorbed well. But after a few hours my skin still is dry and has that “ scratched look” . My Aveno lotion seems to last longer and promote longevity in my tan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is no Other!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the scent. I like the moisture that it provides while I tan in the summer. This is the best priced and best product on the market. This is the third summer I have used this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin, and this stuff is just UHHHHMAZING. The smell is heavenly, I don’t think I’ve ever felt more moisturized. I even used it on my super sensitive face and it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany stedman

customer_reviews.title: My product was delivered unusable. The pump is missing from the bottle. I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use. Please replace this item. A photo is included as it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Averill

customer_reviews.title: Smells like the beach
customer_reviews.text: I got this some time ago in preparation for the summer and sun. I love the sun product smell...just like Australian products. Feel so silky smooth and absorbs really fast. It has kept my skin moisturized and prevents peeling
customer_reviews.author: C. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Australian Golden Moisture was just what I was looking for to extend my tan. It was light but moisturized my skin and was absorbed quickly. My tan lasted much longer than I would have expected without it. The sent was lite as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Brasey

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night after I shower. Smells like I just walked into the tanning salon and I love it. My skin is super soft when I use it too and I definitely feel like my tan lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleejo90

customer_reviews.title: Austrailian Gold Moisture lock Tan extender
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good moisturizer, but I could not get past the smell. It smells like tanning lotion. Who wants to go around smelling like tanning lotion. If you do then you will like it, if you don't then you won't.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and quality of this lotion. Unfortunately my lotion pump bottle doesn’t work. I only purchase pump bottles for all of my lotions, shampoos, soaps, etc. so I hate that it’s defective.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this moisturizer for at least 10 years if not longer. It’s light weight, and hydrates just enough for everyday use whether you are in the sun or not. And the smell is awesome! Not over powering if you where perfume too but light and tropical. I used to buy it in my local pharmacy but they no longer carry it. So glad I found it here!
customer_reviews.author: Charliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, it is my staple skin care product. Non greasy, non allergenic (for me anyway),highly moisturizing, great scent/not overbearing, excellent priced product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzee

customer_reviews.title: broken pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion and have been using it for years. However, I am slightly irritated that out of the 3 bottles I've ordered in the past 5 months, 2 of the pumps have been broken (during shipping I assume), thus making them unusable. Thankfully one of the pumps was functional so I was able to re-use it for the two bottles that were broken. Needs to be packaged better so they won't break during shipping. This would be a 5 star review if it wasn't for the unusable pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marx

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, absorbs quick and isn't greasy
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to match my ocean potion tan extender because they stopped making it and I think i finally found its replacement. Smells good and it absorbs into your skin quickly . Best part is that it isn't greasy feeling at all
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the lotion-but no cap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: While I love everything about this lotion, mine didn’t even come with a cap! Not even a Broken one like in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS EXPIRED BUT STILL WORKED JUST FINE
customer_reviews.text: MINE CAME EXPIRED.. LOL. It’s not a long lasting moisturizing lotion... BUT it does feel nice when you first get out of the sun or tanning bed! It just doesn’t last, so you will need to re apply often if you want that moisture to stay! Scent is really good! It’s summer in a bottle! It is a little over bearing! But overall, not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tyneshia michels

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Did the job @ a fair price. Good thing I like the smell cuz it does have a presence. Beachy coconut. It removed the pain of burn to an extent, and definitely helped turn it into a ran instead of pealing. I'll even use it when I don't need it so much as a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing
customer_reviews.text: First off I tan indoors and outdoors. My skin gets really dry. This lotion works and smells fabulous. Has an island orange scent. My skin feels amazing. I put it on after I shower and all day long my skin feels super soft. I loved it so much. I came back and bought another bottle. Absolutely LOVE this lotion. I have recommended my friends purchase this. Shipping was also Great. Came in about 3 days. Can't say enough great things about this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: GAIL CABANAS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this brand and have bought their tanning lotions all my life, but this moisturizer didn't impress me. I got compliments on the smell, which smells very beachy, but it just seemed watery and thin and didn't moisture my skin as much as I hoped. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla O

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells so bad, it is sickening! It reminds me of the kind of cleaner they use in a public bathroom. You know the one...you walk in the restroom at the mall right after it opens and you know it's been cleaned, but it still smells weird.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: oh this is a great product but i started using it for a different reason then most of you will lol, i am highly allergic to yellow flies someone told me when they used it the yellow fly never bothered them and suggested i try it well i have bought 3 bottles now I am not sure what the yellow flies don't like in it cause it smell like a day at the beach but it WORKED for wording off yellow flies and I got a great tan to boot
customer_reviews.author: linda bussema

customer_reviews.title: Applies smoothly - easy pump action. Great!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way - goes on smooth, absorbs well, and the pump makes it easy to apply one-handed (rather than having to manhandle a slippery tube while trying to squeeze out a decent amount of lotion). Does what it says on the bottle! When it stops pumping it doesn’t mean it’s empty - which can be a little annoying - so we cut the bottle open with a sharp knife and there’s usually another day or two of lotion still inside the bottle. Waste not, want not!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love this lotion! I was using their other after tan lotion called forever and it was way too thick. And sticky feeling. This is perfect and it smells amazing. I bought 3 more bottles.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great after sun lotion
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells great and works wonderful for turning your burn into a tan. It's great to prevent peeling. etc. when you unexpectedly stay out in the sun too long.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy great scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion I use their oil so I figured I'd try the lotion so glad I did. Wonderful scent not heavy at all I've only been using it for a couple of weeks says it tan extender can't really say much about that yet but everything else love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McKean

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff so so much. This is the second bottle I've bought I have never been so passionate about a lotion. It absorbs in your skin so easily and it doesn't feel thick and waxy like every other lotion I've tried. I bought it as a tanning lotion and now its my every day lotion. Don't use it on your face though. It feels amazing on your face but it makes me breakout a little. Other than that 100/100
customer_reviews.author: chase
